FuncDef: The display bfd perlink session command displays information about BFD for Per-Link sessions. The display bfd perlink session command displays information about BFD for Per-Link sessions.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about BFD for Per-Link sessions on a specified interface.
-

ExtraInfo: To view information about the main session and sub-sessions of a BFD for Per-Link session, run the display bfd perlink session command.
